title: Rainy night driving on a city street with moderate speed.
caption: The ego vehicle drives on a rainy city street at moderate speed, passing a red car on the right.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.4 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several cars driving in the same direction as the ego vehicle. A red car is visible on the right side of the road. The traffic lights are green, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street in the distance.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed to ensure safety on the wet road. It passes a red car on the right, keeping a safe distance. The driver is attentive to the pedestrian crossing the street and adjusts the speed accordingly.
